FuncDef: This command configures the rate Internet Control Message Protocol. (ICMP) TTL expired messages are issued by the IP interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of ICMP TTL expired messages to send. This parameter must be specified with the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 2000.
Specifies the time frame, in seconds, used to limit the number of ICMP TTL expired messages that can be issued, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 60.
